main event: A UFO-like object, described as being shaped like a guided missile and emitting chunks of fire, was sighted near Auburn, California on July 21, 1956.
interesting points: The object was 7-8 feet long, green and orange in color, and appeared about 220 feet above the North Fork of the American River.
The object followed the course of the river for 2-3 minutes with no sound.
The sighting was reported by a witness identified as Mr. *****, who was described as an outstanding citizen.
A similar sighting had been reported in Colorado just a few days prior to this incident.
The report was investigated by the Sacramento Air Materiel Area and considered to be a probable light plane.
sighted object: guided missile-shaped object, 7-8 feet long, emitting chunks of fire
